text:
So, for some reason, the ant task for starteam checkout, stcheckout, sometimes
decides to create a folder for a file instead of a file. Then it complains about
access denied when it tries to check out the file. 

If I delete the folder, and check out the file with the starteam client
application, then it is fine, and updates with the ant stcheckou task works as well.
creator: robert.evans@acm.org
antoine@apache.org
text: The starteam tasks have been removed in Ant 1.8.0
